archimate:Device.name: Wireless Barcode Scanner (WBS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Everywhere except where rugged is used e.g. Clinical wards, Emergency Room, Surgical, Medical, Pediatrics, Maternity, ICU • Patient wristband scanning, bedside medication administration, sample/specimen tracking, clinical workflow optimization.
Specifications:
• Scanning Technology: Hybrid laser + 2D imager (reads damaged/bent barcodes at 36") • Connectivity Method: Wireless via Bluetooth or proprietary RF (with cradle receiver connected to PC) • Read Range: 2–18 inches (optimal for clinical environment) • Scan Speed: Minimum 150 scans per second or rapid continuous scanning capability • Durability Rating: IP55+ (liquid splash-resistant, dust-resistant), survives repeated drops of at least 6 ft and UV-C resistant coating (5000+ wipe cycles). • Battery Life: All-day 18hr battery + charging dock sanitizer. • Supported Barcode Symbologies: 1D and 2D (QR codes, DataMatrix, PDF417, Aztec, etc.) • Data Output Formats: USB-HID, serial emulation, keyboard wedge, healthcare-compatible output formats • Ergonomics: Ergonomic design, lightweight (under 8 oz), antimicrobial surface coating, comfortable grip for extended use • Protective Equipment: Medical-grade disinfectable casing, charging dock/cradle with secure mounting options • HL7/FHIR-compatible for integration with CMMS/EAM systems.
